sentences.en: Bright colours and bold strokes characterize his early paintings.
sentences.cn: 他早期绘画的特点是色彩鲜明,笔法粗犷.
明亮的色彩是他绘画作品的特点。

sentences.en: Dissolution and detachment of these cells create epithelial erosions that characterize the disease.
sentences.cn: 这些细胞的溶解和分离,产生恶性卡他热特征的上皮糜烂.

sentences.en: Fractal dimension is an important parameter to characterize roughness in an image.
sentences.cn: 分形维数是描述图像粗糙程度的主要参数.

sentences.en: FWHM of X - ray rocking curve was adapted to characterize the surface damage.
sentences.cn: 采用 X 射线摇摆曲线的半峰宽表征了表面损伤程度.

sentences.en: How would you characterize Meusault's view of capital punishment?
sentences.cn: 你如何评价Meusault眼中的死刑?

sentences.en: How would you characterize the current state affairs in the Japan - China relationship?
sentences.cn: 另外,教科书问题会不会影响日中两国领导人的互访?

sentences.en: Method: Microscopic observation was made to characterize the rhizomes of Curcuma.
sentences.cn: 方法: 利用显微镜,观察根茎组织形态结构及其特点.

sentences.en: Objective To characterize the diagnosis and treatment of gliomatosis cerebri ( GC ).
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨脑胶质瘤病 ( GC ) 的诊断和治疗.

sentences.en: Perfection of means and confusion of goals seem to characterize our age.
sentences.cn: 完美的工具和混淆的目标,似乎是我们这一世代的特点.

sentences.en: Several different names have emerged to characterize different parts of the spectrum.
sentences.cn: 几个不同的名称用来表示电磁波谱的不同部分.

sentences.en: The design elements have come to characterize the age of the skyscraper.
sentences.cn: 设计元素已经成为了摩天大楼时代的特征.

sentences.en: The group was characterized as being well-educated and liberal.
sentences.cn: 该群体被描绘成受过良好教育，思想开明。

sentences.en: the rolling hills that characterize this part of England
sentences.cn: 成为英格兰这一地区特征的绵延起伏的丘陵地

sentences.en: These exponential or logarithmic relationship, that characterize harmonious growth with changing proportions, are termed " allometric ".
sentences.cn: 作为比例有变化的协调增长这些指数或对数关系被标为 “ 开度量 ” 关系.

sentences.en: This diagram immediately suggests defining two quantities which characterize the complex number z.
sentences.cn: 这个图立即指出定义两个表征复数Z的量.

sentences.en: We ordinarily characterize an action as responsible if it was intended.
sentences.cn: 如果行为是有意的,我们一般将其特征归为应负责任的.

words.tran_cn: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的
无个性的；缺乏特征的；平凡的
性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符
在文艺作品中塑造人物；描绘性格
刻划……的性格；表示……的特性

trans.tran_cn: 使具有特点，是…的特征，描绘
trans.tran_en: to be typical of a person, place, or thing

trans.tran_cn: 成为…的特征， 以…为特征； 描绘的特性， 描述
trans.tran_en: to describe the qualities of someone or something in a particular way
